casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2007-0411. Bartchy v. State Bd. of Edn.

Franklin App. No. 06AP-697, 2007-Ohio-300. Discretionary appeals of Cincinnati City School District and State Board of Education accepted.

O’Connor, J., would accept the appeal of Cincinnati City School District on Proposition of Law No. I only. O’Donnell and Cupp, JJ., dissent.
